  • Method Details

    • removeCrew

      public void removeCrew(Player player, List<Coordinates> coordinates, List<Integer> numCrewMembersLost) throws InvalidStateException
      Handles the removal of crew members from a player's ship during the Abandoned Ship event state.
      Overrides:
      removeCrew in class GameState
      Parameters:
      player - the player attempting to remove crew members
      coordinates - a list of coordinates specifying the positions of the crew members to be removed
      numCrewMembersLost - a list of integers representing the number of crew members lost per specified coordinate
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if the action is invalid due to turn order, incorrect crew count, or other game rules

      Updates the given view with the current state of the provided game object.

      Parameters:

      toDisplay - the game object containing the state to render on the view
